  • 已过时的类 
    类和说明
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.event.UserDeletedEvent
    deprecated in sdk version 1.2.0,use LoginStateChangeEvent instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.event.UserLogoutEvent
    deprecated in sdk version 1.2.0 , use LoginStateChangeEvent instead.
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.content.EventNotificationContent.containsGroupOwner()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.5
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.createConversation(ConversationType, long)
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.createGroupConversation(long)、Conversation.createSingleConversation(String) instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.createConversation(ConversationType, String)
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.createGroupConversation(long)、Conversation.createSingleConversation(String) instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.JMessageClient.enterSingleConversaion(String)
    deprecated in 1.2.0 useJMessageClient.enterSingleConversation(String, String) instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.JMessageClient.exitConversaion()
    deprecated in 1.2.0. use JMessageClient.exitConversation() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.UserInfo.getAvatarFileAsync(DownloadAvatarCallback)
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.5,use UserInfo.getAvatarBitmap(GetAvatarBitmapCallback) instead
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Message.getFromID()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Message.getFromUser() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Message.getFromName()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Message.getFromUser() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.GroupInfo.getGroupMemberInfo(String)
    deprecated in jmessage 1.3.0 use GroupInfo.getGroupMemberInfo(String, String) instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.getLastMsgDate()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.getLatestMessage() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.getLatestText()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.getLatestMessage() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.getLatestType()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.getLatestMessage() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Conversation.getTargetId()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Conversation.getTargetInfo() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Message.getTargetID()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Message.getTargetInfo() instead.
    cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.Message.getTargetName()
    deprecated in sdk version 1.1.4. Use Message.getTargetInfo() instead.
